message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value, I believe it's worth $120. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your perspective, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, how about we settle at $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $105?
Bob, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. Considering the quality and value of the product, I propose we finalize the deal at $107.50.
I'm getting close, but I think I can still get a better deal. How about $105.50?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence. To reach a fair agreement, I am willing to accept $106 for the product. This price reflects both the value you see in it and the cost of production.
I'm really close, but I think I can squeeze a bit more out of this deal. How about $105?
Bob, I've carefully considered your offers and I'm willing to agree on a price of $105.50 for the product. This price respects the value you place on it and also covers our costs.
